This includes added all translation languages as podcast suggestion filters and some updates to the filtering. Suggestion can now have multiple genres, categories and languages. They are also "new" for 30 days.

title: Introduce suggestion importer
message:
Introduce suggestion importer

The new test class takes an array of podcasts URLs and get all the relevant suggestion information from the feeds. The data will be put in a JSON file on the device running the test and can then be imported to podcatcher-deluxe.com.

title: Make sure to sanitize all data written to OPML files.
message:
Make sure to sanitize all data written to OPML files.

Otherwise, reading them might fail, causing all kind of bad situations. In particular the URL for the feed and the logo should not contain invalid characters. Also we will base64-encode the user name and password, since we do not control its contents.

title: Introduce episode metadata box in episode fragment
message:
Introduce episode metadata box in episode fragment

This commit adds infrastructure and UI for episode metadata, in particular media type, playback duration, and download file size,
to be stored, handled, and display by the app. The information in read from the podcast feed and potentially augmented when
the app itself get new (better) data, for example because a download is triggered.

message:
Go to android plugin 0.14 and Gradle 2.1, this time for real

Fix service not loading issue due to wrong manifest merge, refer to service by its full class name

title: Fix gpodder icons color profile warning
message: Fix gpodder icons color profile warning

title: Add rewind on resume
message:
Add rewind on resume

Makes the player rewind for a short bit if it has been paused for a long time or the episode has been changed.
This allows for the listener to recognize the point where playback was interrupted.

title: Review menu definition xml files
message:
Review menu definition xml files

Remove double player.xml, move to main folder, make sure ordering of the menu items is actually right

title: Adapt notifications to work with Android 5.0 Lollipop
message: Adapt notifications to work with Android 5.0 Lollipop

title: Revert update to new Gradle version 2.1 and Android plugin 0.13 (again!)
message:
Revert update to new Gradle version 2.1 and Android plugin 0.13 (again!)

This still produces bad apks that do not work

title: Remove preferences "wide episode list" and "theme color"
message:
Remove preferences "wide episode list" and "theme color"

These are not as useful anymore and/or will not be needed in the new Material design.

title: Review OPML I/O
message:
Review OPML I/O

Make sure the title attribute is written out as well as the logo URL using clean namespace definitions.
Including the logo URL allows for the app to show the logo even if offline in the case were Picasso still has it in the cache.

title: Finally update to new Gradle version 2.1 and Android plugin 0.13
message: Finally update to new Gradle version 2.1 and Android plugin 0.13

title: Make sure the recommended download folder option is always present
message: Make sure the recommended download folder option is always present

title: Version X.1
message: Version X.1

title: Add improved download folder selection
message:
Add improved download folder selection

Instead of simply presenting a folder chooser, show a sensible list of choices.
There are also a number of related improvements in this commit, including new icons and translation updates for Russian and Ukrainian.

title: Fix menu icon ordering in Simple Podcatcher
message:
Fix menu icon ordering in Simple Podcatcher

The play button should be on the left.

title: Update to the latest build tools
message: Update to the latest build tools

title: Update target SDK to the new Lollipop Android 5.0
message: Update target SDK to the new Lollipop Android 5.0

title: Show rew/ff buttons instead of skip ahead in small player
message: Show rew/ff buttons instead of skip ahead in small player

title: Even more work on thread pools and thread names
message:
Even more work on thread pools and thread names

Adjust thread pools to their tasks and make threads have nice names when debugging. Also refactor some task code.

title: Review and performance test thread pool sizes
message:
Review and performance test thread pool sizes

Instead of using the default values, test for good thread pool sizes on different devices. Use pool sizes
compatible with the tasks carried out by the threads.

title: Apply former commit "Make sure downloads list updates properly when a downloads…
message:
Apply former commit "Make sure downloads list updates properly when a downloads finishes" to simple version

Until now the user had to reload the downloads list to make it update. This commit makes it updated on download completion.

title: Update to new Dropbox Sync API version 3.1.1
message: Update to new Dropbox Sync API version 3.1.1

title: Make sure downloads list updates properly when a downloads finishes
message:
Make sure downloads list updates properly when a downloads finishes

Until now the user had to reload the downloads list to make it update. This commit makes it updated on download completion.
Also, it moves the episode downloads off the default async executor since that has the same problem as the podcast loading
and tends to block other tasks that should run at higher priority.

title: Catch BadTokenException that is thrown by the Amazon devices here
message: Catch BadTokenException that is thrown by the Amazon devices here

title: Improve episode description web view
message:
Improve episode description web view

Adapt web view settings to show complete episode description and scale images that might be part of it. This also adopts to the different web view versions used by
the various Android version and makes sure to set correct encoding.

title: Switch to isActiveNetworkMetered API offered by Android SDK >= 16
message:
Switch to isActiveNetworkMetered API offered by Android SDK >= 16

The app used another fast and free network heuristic so far, this commit switches it to the official API for devices running Jelly Bean or later.

title: Improve threading, create dedicated thread queue for podcasts
message:
Improve threading, create dedicated thread queue for podcasts

Refactors some threading code and check the thread priorities set. Also, it put podcast remote feed loading (async tasks)
in a separate thread queue in order to un-block other task that might be running at the same time and get stuck behind
podcast loads on a slow connection (e.g. load downloads/playlist tasks).
